data.current_summary: Fetch flex user for the given flex user sid
data.current_description: Fetch flex user for the given flex user sid
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a Flex user by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific Flex user resource by their unique FlexUserSid within a Flex instance. Requires the InstanceSid and FlexUserSid as path parameters. Returns the complete Flex user object containing user profile, status, and configuration details. Use this operation to fetch individual user information for display, validation, or integration purposes.

data.current_summary: Update flex user for the given flex user sid
data.current_description: Update flex user for the given flex user sid
data.description_suggestion: Updates properties of a specific Flex user identified by FlexUserSid within a Flex instance. Accepts a request body with updatable user fields such as status, availability, or configuration settings. Returns the updated Flex user object reflecting all changes. Supports partial updates - only provided fields are modified. This operation modifies the user's state in the Flex system and may affect their availability and routing behavior.

data.summary_suggestion: Create a new web chat channel
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new web channel for customer engagement within Flex. Accepts a request body containing channel configuration parameters such as channel name, display settings, and routing rules. Returns the newly created web_channel object with a unique channel identifier and status. The created channel becomes immediately available for customer interactions and can be embedded in web applications. Use this operation to provision new communication channels for web-based customer support.
